subject: Mental Health
title: Philippe Pinel Unchains the Insane
description: Learn Philippe Pinel Unchains the Insane in one minute.

hook.text: In 1793, a French doctor walked into an asylum and ordered the chains removed.

buildup.text: Philippe Pinel believed the mentally ill were sick people, not animals to be caged.

discovery.text: He introduced moral treatment â€” humane care based on kindness and structured activity.

twist.text: When the chains came off, patients actually improved. Violence decreased, not increased.

climax.text: Pinel's revolution spread across Europe and transformed institutional care.

punchline.text: The cure began when the chains came off.

quiz.question: What was Philippe Pinel's revolutionary act?
options: Removing chains from asylum patients and treating them humanely
